ISSUE.TITLE: The test device is released after reselecting device from device list view
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: <!-- *Before creating an issue please make sure you are using the latest version of STF.* --> **What is the issue or idea you have?** The test device is released after re-selecting him again from device view **Does it only happen on a specific device? Please run `adb devices -l` and paste the corresponding row.** N/A **Please provide the steps to reproduce the issue.** 1. Login 2. Select one of available test devices from Device -> Device Icon List view 3. Wait for redirecting to Control View 4. Navigate to Devices list view by clicking *Devices* on top Navigation view 5. Re-select test device clicking on *device image* or *device name* ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/22797365/61459205-81c14580-a96c-11e9-9299-449c85ba89cd.png) **What is the expected behavior?** The user should be redirected to Control View **What is the actual behavior?** The test device is released. Is no longer assigned to end user. **Do you see errors or warnings in the `stf local` output? If so, please paste them or the full log here.** N/A **Please run `stf doctor` and paste the output here.** N/A <!-- Love OpenSTF? Please consider supporting our collective: https://opencollective.com/openstf/donate -->

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Add test for issue #1076 Add tests for device icon view
Merge pull request #1077 from lukzeg/fix/enable_reopening_device_view #1076 - Fix/enable reopening device view
